articles.title: ‘Thunderbolts’ and ‘Sinners’ top box office charts once more - AP News
articles.description: Marvel’s “Thunderbolts” and Ryan Coogler’s “Sinners” are dominating the North American box office charts again. According to studio estimates on Sunday, “Thunderbolts” took first place, with $33.1 million in its second weekend in theaters in the U.S. and Cana…
articles.content:
Marvels Thunderbolts and Ryan Cooglers Sinners dominated the North American box office charts again this weekend.
